ygData.subject: Re: Mind Wipe and Blanket of Forgetfulness
ygData.msgSnippet: This was against none agro and agro things I used these spells.  I do it from a distance they come.  I was in Sol A the other night in the gabbie room I used
ygData.messageBody:
This was against none agro and agro things I used these spells. I do it
from a distance they come. I was in Sol A the other night in the gabbie
room I used mind wipe and I am amiable normally. Everything including the
guard guys by the gate and the vendor came at me.




>
>it's supposed to wipe their hate list... while none of the blurs are 100%
>effective, i've never had a mob aggro on me after casting it (though i
>never cast it on a mob tat ISNT aggro to me)
>
>At 07:26 AM 12/8/99 -0800, you wrote:
>>From: Jeff Wilkinson <kng@...>
>>
>>first off what is the diffence between these too they seem to do the same
>>thing for me. Also why if you cast these spells does it agro eveything
>>around you? I though it was suppose to be a blur. I dont remember blanket
>>agroing things before last patch did they screw it up or did I just get
>>lucky and it didnt agro them? I didnt get Mind Wipe till after the patch
>>but it did the same thing too me agroing everything it hit onto me.
>>
>>
>>Kryten Emohawk
>>level 50 Enchanter E'CI
>>
